opis: Eng: I am selling an impressive villa situated on a spacious plot of 666 m² near the sea. The total gross area of ​​the house, including the roof terrace, is approximately 950 m², and the villa consists of: - Basement: 50 m² - 1st floor (300 m² gross): 3 apartments 1 apartment with 2 bedrooms 2 apartments with 3 bedrooms - 2nd floor (300 m² gross): 3 apartments 1 apartment with 2 bedrooms 2 apartments with 3 bedrooms Flat roof (300 m² gross): Large terrace All apartments have a kitchen, dining room, living room, bathroom/WC, bedrooms and a balcony. The interior is plastered, the plumbing, drainage system and air conditioning installations are neatly resolved. The bathrooms and WCs are decorated. All papers are in order, and all obligations have been settled. The villa is being sold in its current condition, providing an excellent opportunity to invest in a property with several apartments in an attractive location. For more information or to arrange a viewing, please feel free to contact me! Tel:0038631356204 Tel: 0038670461705  Matija eng. HR: Prodajem impresivnu vilu smještenu na prostranom zemljištu od 666 m² blizu mora. Ukupna bruto površina kuće, uključujući terasu na krovu, iznosi oko 950 m², a vila se sastoji od: - Podruma: 50 m² -1. kata (300 m² brutto): 3 apartmana 1 apartman sa 2 spavaće sobe 2 apartmana sa 3 spavaće sobe - 2. kata (300 m² brutto): 3 apartmana 1 apartman sa 2 spavaće sobe 2 apartmana sa 3 spavaće sobe - Ravnog krova (300 m² brutto): Velika terasa Svi apartmani imaju kuhinju, blagovaonicu, dnevni boravak, kupaonicu/WC, spavaće sobe i balkon. Unutrašnjost je ožbukana, vodovod, odvodni sustav i instalacije za klima uređaje uredno su riješeni. Kupaonice i WC - ovi su uređeni. Svi papiri su uredni, a sve obveze podmirene. Vila se prodaje u trenutačnom stanju, pružajući izvrsnu priliku za ulaganje u nekretninu s više apartmana u atraktivnoj lokaciji. Za više informacija ili dogovor o razgledu, slobodno me kontaktirajte! Tel:0038631356204
